Goal Representation:
['1. Crack the eggs into a bowl and beat them well.', '2. Pour the beaten eggs into a heated pan.', 
'3. Scramble the eggs by stirring them until they are cooked to your liking.']

def is_bowl(x: item):
    return exists b: item : is_bowl(b) and x == b

def close_to(x: item, y: item):
    return close(x, y)

behavior achieve_close_char_to_bowl(bowl:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, bowl)
        
behavior achieve_eggs_cracked_in_bowl(eggs:item, bowl:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(eggs, bowl)

behavior achieve_eggs_beaten(eggs:item):
    body:
        # Assume eggs need to be beaten after they are cracked into the bowl
        achieve dirty(eggs) # Denoting the eggs are beaten (state could be different in actual imple
mentation)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind eggs: item where:
            is_food_egg(eggs)
        
        bind bowl: item where:
            is_bowl(bowl)
       
        achieve_once inhand(eggs)
        
        achieve_close_char_to_bowl(bowl)
        
        achieve_eggs_cracked_in_bowl(eggs, bowl)
        
        achieve_eggs_beaten(eggs)

['1. Crack the egg and beat it until the yolk and white are combined.', '2. Pour the beaten egg into
 a heated pan and scramble until cooked to your preference.']
